title: Leica EZ4 E Stereo Microscope for Education with Integrated Wired Camera
description: The Leica EZ4 E stereo microscope is a powerful tool for educational exploration, featuring outstanding optics and a user-friendly design. With its integrated wired camera, this microscope provides a seamless and efficient way for students to capture and document their discoveries. The wired camera ensures a reliable and stable connection, allowing students to easily share their observations and enhance their learning experience. The Leica EZ4 E is the perfect choice for classrooms, enabling students to explore the microscopic world while effortlessly documenting their findings with the integrated wired camera.

title: Leica A60 F Inspection and Rework Microscope with Flexarm Stand
description: The Leica A60 F stereo microscope with a flexible Flexarm stand is an exceptional tool for inspection and rework applications. Engineered for precision and versatility, this microscope provides unparalleled clarity and flexibility in various workspaces. The innovative Flexarm stand allows users to position the microscope effortlessly for detailed inspection and intricate rework tasks. With its superior optics and adjustable design, the Leica A60 F is the perfect solution for professionals seeking a reliable and adaptable stereo microscope to enhance the efficiency and accuracy of their inspection and rework processes.

title: CatchPoint® cGMP Fluorescent Assay Kit
description: The second messenger cyclic GMP (cGMP) modulates cellular processes, including smooth muscle relaxation, kidney function, and inflammation, by activating effectors such as protein kinases, cGMP-dependent phosphodiesterases, and cGMP-gated ion channels.

title: FLIPR® Calcium Assay Kits
description:
FLIPR Calcium Assay Kits are the platform of choice for measuring changes of intracellular calcium for drug discovery and basic research.

Maximizes fluorescent signal from a wide range of cell types by reducing cell wash artifacts
Reduces well-to-well variability, improving assay quality (Z' factor) and reliability (CV %) of high-throughput screens

title: Leica Ivesta 3 Stereo Microscopes for Inspection
description: The Leica Ivesta 3 stereo microscope is a precision instrument engineered for meticulous inspection and rework tasks. Designed for professionals, this microscope offers superior optics, ensuring unparalleled clarity in detailed work. Its ergonomic design and advanced features make it an indispensable tool for professionals engaged in inspection and rework applications. Elevate your workmanship with the Leica Ivesta 3, a reliable stereo microscope crafted to enhance accuracy and efficiency in tasks requiring meticulous attention and precision.

title: Leica DM500 Educational Microscope with Integrated Wireless Camera
description: The Leica DM500 microscope combines precision optics with modern technology, featuring an integrated wireless camera for seamless documentation. Ideal for educational and routine laboratory use, this microscope offers exceptional clarity and ease of use. The innovative wireless camera functionality allows users to effortlessly capture and share their observations, promoting efficient collaboration and documentation. Elevate your microscopy experience with the Leica DM500, where cutting-edge optics meet wireless convenience for a versatile and user-friendly solution in various applications.

title: X500B QTOF System
description: Engineered for standard biotherapeutic characterization analyses, the X500B QTOF system is a true benchtop instrument, with streamlined processing to get to a consistent, accurate view of your biologic. It is optimized for intact mass analysis, subunit analysis as well as high-quality peptide mapping workflows.

title: Triple Quad™ 6500+ System
description: The Triple Quad 6500+ system features multi-component IonDrive technology that pushes the boundaries of quantitation. The sensitivity, speed, and performance delivered through these technology enhancements enable you to see it all, from low mass to high mass compounds.

title: QTRAP® 4500 System
description: The QTRAP 4500 System offers reliable quantitation and library searching - with 100X more full-scan sensitivity over basic triple quads in the same class.

description:
Easily inspect, screen, observe or document. Handle your daily inspection or documentation, work confidently, and stay flexible in times of change. title: Leica DM4 B Upright Microscopes
description: Increase your work efficiency with the Leica DM4 B upright digital research microscopes! Ideally suited to making your work life easier in biomedical research and clinical labs alike.

title: Leica DM6 B Upright Microscopes
description: Increase your work efficiency with the Leica DM6 B upright digital research microscopes! Ideally suited to making your work life easier in biomedical research and clinical labs alike.

title: A60 F & A60 S Stereo Microscopes
description:
Optimize your productivity and production quality
The intuitive A60 F and A60 S stereo microscopes fulfill what you need – high sample throughput, optimum visibility of product details and components, and easy processing of subassemblies.

See 80% more of your sample with a 46 mm object field
Comfortable access your sample due to the 122 mm working distance
Easy handling, less refocusing and time saving with up to 13.6 mm depth of field and Leica FusionOptics technology
Enables large surface overview and detailed observation with a magnification range from 5x to 30x
The A60 is designed for long periods of continuous use and quickly adapts to different users. With a 38° viewing angle, the A60 allows the user to maintain a natural head posture. The operating elements such as the zoom adjustment, focus knob, and ring light are intuitive and easily accessible, by left and right-handed users alike.

title: STELLARIS 8 DIVE Multiphoton Microscope
description:
Multicolor Multiphoton gets you closer to the truth
The combination of multiple distinct fluorescent labels is increasingly used to study dynamic interaction and spatial relationships among cells and molecules. The goal is to understand a myriad of complex biological events, such as cellular connectivity, cell phenotyping, protein  interaction or co-expression, and co-localization. Scaling up such studies to whole organs or tissues requires suitable large-volume multicolor microscopy methods. DIVE and STELLARIS have now merged to provide you with the power of flexible multicolor multiphoton imaging. Furthermore, you can expand the potential of your experiments with additional label-free imaging capabilities.

Seamlessly integrated into the confocal software interface, STELLARIS 8 DIVE multiphoton microscope offers the benefits of high speed and excellent navigation so that dynamic processes in complex samples can be studied with ease. STELLARIS 8 DIVE – A rainbow of possibilities for your research.

title: Leica DMIL Fluorescence for Fluorescence Cell Culture
description: The Leica DM IL LED is tailored for phase contrast and fluorescence monitoring of cell cultures and individual cells.  With its advanced LED illumination system and precision optics, it supports routine tasks in cell culture labs like confluence estimation and  transfection efficiency checks.  Elevate your cell culture research with the Leica DM IL LED, providing superior fluorescence capabilities for enhanced visualization and insights into the dynamic of cell cultures.

title: Leica DM750 Educational Microscope with Eyepiece Pointers and Koehler Illumination
description: The Leica DM750 microscope is a versatile and powerful tool designed for educational excellence. Tailored for optimal learning experiences, it features an eyepiece pointer for interactive teaching and Koehler illumination for enhanced sample visibility. With precision optics and user-friendly design, the Leica DM750 ensures clear and detailed observations, making it an ideal choice for educators and students alike. Elevate your classroom experience with this microscope that combines educational functionality and advanced features for a comprehensive and engaging exploration of the microscopic world.

title: RoboLector Platform
description: The RoboLector is an automated cultivation platform which combines the high-throughput cultivation and online monitoring capability of the BioLector microbioreactor with the precise and accurate liquid handling of a robotic system.

description: The integration of the BioLector XT microbioreactor and a Biomek i-Series liquid handler allows you to increase your walk-away time for microbial strain and process screening experiments by unlocking the full potential of an automated screening platform.

description:

title: CatchPoint® cAMP Fluorescent Assay Kit
description: Cell signaling via G protein-coupled receptors (GPCRs) can be assessed by monitoring the downstream effectors calcium or Cyclic AMP (cAMP). Monitoring levels of cAMP, a second messenger produced in response to activation of adenylate cyclase, is one of the most common ways to screen for agonists and antagonists of GPCRs.

title: STELLARIS DLS Digital Light Sheet Microscope
description:
Light Sheet Re-Imagined
STELLARIS 5 and STELLARIS 8 Digital LightSheet (DLS) unite in one place a confocal system and a light sheet microscope – a unique combination aimed to make your research more versatile. The exclusive vertical design of DLS, enabled by Leica Microsystems’ proprietary TwinFlect mirrors, allows you to combine confocal and light sheet imaging in the same system, so you can easily adapt the microscopy method to your experimental needs.



DLS also brings flexibility to your research with the capacity to image different types of samples, such as model organisms, organoids or cleared tissue, and the ability to take advantage of the full excitation spectrum. This flexibility is possible thanks to the STELLARIS White Light Laser and the ability to perform multi-position light sheet experiments whilst using standard glass bottom plates. All of this helps you add new and better ways to explore your research questions.

title: Leica DM1000 Uniquely Ergonomic System Microscope
description:
The ergonomically designed Leica DM1000 with adjustable features and easy-to-use controls adapts to every user to improve comfort and convenience while working at the microscope.

Featuring high-quality optical performance, the Leica DM1000 is ideal for all clinical laboratory applications, in particular cytology, haematology, and pathology. For special diagnostics requirements, the microscope is certified for in-vitro-diagnostics (IVD) like in-vitro-fertilization (IVF).

Its advanced capabilities, including fluorescence, make it well suited also for complex tasks.

title: SCIEX OS Software
description: The next generation of operating system for enhanced LC-MS/MS analysis. It’s available on our compact, easy-to-use, high resolution, accurate mass X-series QTOF systems.

title: Aivia AI Image Analysis Software
description:
Designed to improve accuracy, streamline workflows, and enhance data exploration.

Subjectivity of analysis and poor reproducibility are key hurdles to be overcome for biological image analysis. Standard segmentation can lead to sub-standard results and require substantial manual curation which is subject to human error.

Aivia changes all of that.

title: Triple Quad™ 4500 LC-MS/MS System
description: The Triple Quad 4500 system takes the API 4000 platform and intelligently re-engineers it to set a new benchmark for reliable quantitation. Designed for food, environmental, forensics and clinical research.

title: Leica M125 C Encoded Stereo Microscopes
description:
Total recall of your settings
Your goal: high-quality images that allow measurements and can be accurately repeated with minimal effort. The Leica coded stereo microscopes help you to pave the way to correct results.

Coded microscopes consistently deliver calibrated and comparable images
Reproduce images in moments with the Leica “Store and Recall” function
Fully apochromatic corrected zoom optics deliver high quality images
Customize the microscope system to your task with the exclusive range of accessories

title: Triple Quad™ 3500 LC-MS/MS System
description: This system offers productivity, reliability, and robustness in a modernized entry-level mass spec for today’s analytical laboratories. The Triple Quad 3500 system offers the speed and precision you want from a modern mass spec system, with the legendary performance and dependability you trust from SCIEX technology.

title: Leica DM1000 LED Ergonomic System Microscope
description:
The Leica DM1000 LED features long-life LED illumination that provides near daylight, bright illumination with constant color temperature and emits less heat.

The LED also eliminates the need for lamp changes, which saves time and money. Because of its low power consumption, the system is energy efficient. Users of the Leica DM1000 LED benefit from the system’s ability to uniquely adapt to every user.

It is ideal for all clinical laboratory applications, especially for cytology, haematology, and pathology. For special diagnostics requirements, the microscope is certified for in-vitro-diagnostics (IVD) like in-vitro-fertilization (IVF).

title: M5 MicroLC System
description:
See More with Microflow LC-MS
The M5 MicroLC system is the perfect balance of sensitivity and robustness—more sensitive than traditional analytical flow LC, and more flexible and more robust than nanoflow LC — giving you the potential to optimize your critical workflows, today and into the future.

title: Leica LMD7 Laser Microdissection Microscopes
description:
Dissection Perfection
Laser Microdissection (LMD, also known as Laser Capture Microdissection or LCM) enables users to isolate specific single cells or entire areas of tissue. Powered by a unique laser design and dynamic software, Leica LMD systems allow users to easily isolate Regions of Interest (ROI) from entire areas of tissue down to single cells or even subcellular structures such as chromosomes.

LMD is typically used in genomics (DNA), transcriptomics (mRNA, miRNA), proteomics, metabolomics, and even next generation sequencing (NGS). Researchers in neurology, cancer research, plant analysis, forensics or climate research rely on this method. Furthermore, LMD is a perfect tool for live cell culture (LCC), for cloning and re-cultivation, manipulation or downstream analysis.

We move the laser, not the sample. And we use gravity for collection. That is why our LMD systems provide you with perfectly cut, contamination-free, analysis-ready dissectates.

title: ExionLC™ 2.0 and ExionLC™ 2.0+ Systems
description:
Reproducibility, reliability and carryover performance that meets your workflow demands, injection to injection, batch after batch.
ExionLC 2.0 and ExionLC 2.0+ systems provide full integration, control and compatibility with SCIEX mass spectrometers bringing together the speed and precision you expect for a complete solution that meets every challenge your lab faces.

title: Leica EZ4
description: Educational stereo microscope for beginners in college and university

title: Leica DM IL LED Inverted Laboratory Microscope
description:
With high-performance optics and ergonomic design, the Leica DM IL LED is ideal for cell culture, micromanipulation, documentation of immunostained specimens, and routine live cell examinations.

The Leica DM IL LED features a comprehensive set of contrast methods to monitor your specimen the way you need. High-quality Phase contrast, excellent modulation contrast and brilliant fluorescence are just one fingertip away. Robust stability, plenty of space to work with tools, long working distances to accommodate large culture flasks and a stable illumination without heat make work at the microscope easy and convenient.

For special diagnostics requirements, the microscope is certified for in-vitro-diagnostics (IVD) including in-vitro-fertilization (IVF).

title: Leica M205 A Encoded Stereo Microscopes
description:
Total recall of your settings
Your goal: high-quality images that allow measurements and can be accurately repeated with minimal effort. The Leica coded stereo microscopes help you to pave the way to correct results.

Coded microscopes consistently deliver calibrated and comparable images

Customize the microscope system to your task with the exclusive range of accessories

title: Leica DM2500 Optical Microscopes
description: Ergonomic systems for routine and research applications

title: STELLARIS 5 Cryo Confocal Light Microscopes
description: The STELLARIS 5 Cryo is a confocal light microscope system that helps you to target your area of interest for cryo-electron tomography (CryoET). The STELLARIS 5 Cryo gives you the precision to target reliably, while still offering superior performance you can count on and improved productivity for your experiments.

title: K5 sCMOS Microscope Camera
description: For routine fluorescence imaging

title: STELLARIS 8 FALCON FLIM Microscopes
description:
The contrast is clear. Lifetime imaging in an instant.
STELLARIS 8 FALCON (FAst Lifetime CONtrast) is the future of functional imaging. Harness the power of fluorescence lifetime to investigate cellular physiology and explore dynamics in living cells. STELLARIS 8 FALCON is a fully integrated solution for Fluorescence Lifetime Imaging (FLIM) and enables video-rate lifetime imaging acquisition for rapid kinetic studies in live cells.



STELLARIS 8 FALCON adds a new dimension of contrast to your imaging, opening the door to biosensing and tracking of interactions between proteins. FLIM information is now available for all modalities of the STELLARIS 8 system.



Now you can:

Follow fast molecular interactions via FLIM-FRET (Förster Resonance Energy Transfer)
Use biosensors to detect changes in metabolic state and microenvironment
Apply lifetime contrast to separate multiple fluorophores
Acquire FLIM data with minimal training

title: Gemini™ XPS and EM Microplate Readers
description: Fluorescence detection without filters

title: Cell DIVE Multiplex Imaging Solution
description:
What if every scientist could map normal and diseased tissue by cell type, biomarker profile, and specific features?

Cell DIVE is a precise, open multiplexing solution that lets your research dictate the level of automation required, which antibodies to use, how to build your antibody panel, and more.

title: FlexStation® 3 Multi-Mode Microplate Reader
description: Precise optics, fluidic transfer, and assay flexibility on one integrated microplate reader

title: STELLARIS STED Microscopes
description:
Get faster to the truth
Our STED (stimulated emission depletion) technology joins the STELLARIS platform to provide you the fastest way of imaging beyond the diffraction limit. Obtain cutting-edge nanoscopy results in no time with astounding image quality and resolution, while protecting your sample. STED super-resolution allows you to study multiple dynamic events simultaneously, so you can investigate molecular relationships and mechanisms within the cellular context.

The seamless integration of STED and STELLARIS provides easy access to STED directly from the confocal interface, making it just a few clicks away. Now you can get more insights from your sample, because every detail matters.

title: SpectraMax® QuickDrop Micro-Volume Spectrophotometer
description: One-touch DNA, RNA, and protein quantitation in a full-spectrum micro-volume absorbance spectrophotometer

Laser Microdissection (LMD, also known as Laser Capture Microdissection or LCM) enables users to isolate specific single cells or entire areas of tissue. Powered by a unique laser design and dynamic software, Leica LMD systems allow users to easily isolate Regions of Interest (ROI) from entire areas of tissue down to single cells or even subcellular structures such as chromosomes.

LMD is typically used in genomics (DNA), transcriptomics (mRNA, miRNA), proteomics, metabolomics, and even next generation sequencing (NGS). Furthermore, LMD is a perfect tool for live cell culture (LCC), for cloning and re-cultivation, manipulation or downstream analysis.

title: M205 FA Fluorescence Stereo Microscopes
description:
Capture bright images – fast!
Do you sometimes feel like you are fishing in the dark because you are looking for fluorescence signals that are increasingly faint and weak? Brightness and high resolution images are a must in modern developmental biology and research. Leica Microsystems has developed the M205 FA fluorescence stereo microscopes to enable you to detect transgenic expression like GFP and mCherry in early stages, allowing you to select the right sample to successfully base your studies on.

title: Echo 525 Acoustic Liquid Handler
description:

Highly precise and accurate low volume transfers enabling assay miniaturization

title: Leica DM750 Educational Microscope with Integrated Wireless Camera, Koehler Illumination and Premium Optics
description: The Leica DM750 microscope is an exemplary educational tool, seamlessly merging cutting-edge features with premium optics. Tailored for optimal learning experiences, it boasts an integrated wireless camera for seamless documentation, Koehler illumination for superior sample visibility, and top-tier optics for clear and detailed observations. Designed with educators and students in mind, the Leica DM750 elevates the classroom experience by combining educational functionality with advanced imaging capabilities, ensuring a comprehensive and engaging exploration of the microscopic world. Immerse your classroom in clarity, convenience, and educational excellence with the Leica DM750.

title: Leica DM300 Introductory Educational Microscope
description: The Leica DM300 binocular microscope is a dedicated tool crafted for educational environments, offering an ideal blend of simplicity and functionality. Specifically designed for educational purposes, it provides students with a clear and immersive experience for exploring the microscopic world. With user-friendly features and reliable optics, the Leica DM300 binocular version is the perfect companion for educators aiming to enhance the learning journey by providing students with a solid foundation in microscopy. Elevate your classroom experience with this accessible and educational microscope.

title: Cytobank Premium Software
description: Quick insights with confidence in your results

title: Leica M80 Ergonomic Stereomicroscope for Inspection
description: The Leica M80 stereo microscope sets the standard for precision inspection with its ergonomic design. Crafted for professionals, this microscope offers superior optics and a comfortable ergonomic setup, ensuring prolonged usage without compromising efficiency. The Leica M80 seamlessly integrates clarity and user-friendly features, making it the ideal choice for professionals seeking an ergonomic solution for detailed inspection tasks. Elevate your inspection experience with the Leica M80, where precision meets ergonomic design for optimal performance in the field of microscopy.

title: Cytobank Enterprise Software
description: Quick insights with confidence in your results

title: Leica A60 S Inspection and Rework Microscope with Boom Stand
description: The Leica A60 S stereo microscope with boom stand is tailored for inspection and rework applications. Crafted for professional use, this microscope boasts superior optics and a flexible boom stand, delivering unparalleled clarity and adaptability. The boom stand ensures effortless positioning, making it an indispensable tool for intricate rework tasks and detailed inspections. Elevate your workmanship with the Leica A60 S, a reliable stereo microscope meticulously designed to enhance efficiency and accuracy in the dynamic realms of inspection and rework.

title: Leica DM500 Educational Microscope with Integrated Wireless Camera and Eyepiece Pointers
description: The Leica DM500 microscope is a versatile and user-friendly tool designed for educational exploration. Featuring precision optics, an integrated wireless camera, and an eyepiece pointer, this microscope provides a comprehensive learning experience. The integrated wireless camera allows seamless documentation and sharing of observations, enhancing collaboration in the classroom. The added eyepiece pointer aids educators in guiding students to specific points of interest during lessons, making the Leica DM500 an exceptional choice for educational settings where clarity, engagement, and interactive learning are paramount.

title: BioLector XT Microbioreactors
description: The BioLector XT microbioreactor enables real-time evaluation of biomass, fluorescence, pH, dissolved oxygen in the liquid phase (DO), and other key cultivation parameters for aerobic, anaerobic and phototrophic microorganisms.

title: Leica DMIL Fluorescence for Fluorescence Cell Culture with Documentation
description: The Leica DM IL LED, equipped with a Leica K3C camera, is tailored for phase contrast and  fluorescence imaging of cell cultures and individual cells.  The system and the intuitive LASX software  document seamlessly routine tasks in cell culture labs like confluence estimation and  transfection efficiency checks.  Elevate your cell culture research with the Leica DM IL LED, featuring a color camera for seamless image capture and providing superior fluorescence capabilities for enhanced visualization and insights into dynamic cell culture phenomena.

title: Leica MZ10 F Modular Stereo Microscopes for Fluorescent Imaging
description: Modular Stereo Microscope for Fluorescent Imaging - The Leica MZ10 F modular stereo microscope with 8x-80x magnification and 375 Lp/mm high resolution provides triple beam technology , which designates a separate beam path specifically for fluorescent illumination for high contrast and detailed fluo

title: Leica MZ10F for Fluorescence Sorting
description: The Leica MZ10-F stereo microscope is a cutting-edge instrument designed for precision and clarity in microscopic observation. With its advanced optics and ergonomic design, this microscope is particularly well-suited for cell sorting applications. Delivering exceptional image quality and versatility, the Leica MZ10-F enhances the efficiency and accuracy of cell sorting processes, making it an indispensable tool for researchers and professionals in the field of life sciences.

title: Leica DM6 FS
description:
High Stability
Do you work in a field such as electrophysiology, evolutionary biology, or neuroscience where outstanding stability is required for successful experiments? The Leica DM6 FS fixed stage fluorescence microscope is a suitable instrument for your present and future challenges.

Perform your experiment with a high degree of mechanical and electronic stability
Save time using the microscope’s full range of automated functions
Efficiently work with tools and accessories using special Leica optics that provide ample clearance around the specimen
Add special techniques based on the Leica DM6 FS for Optogenetics and Cryo CLEM

title: DMi1 Inverted Microscope for Cell Culture
description:
Just Right – Smart Choice
The DMi1 inverted microscope supports your specific work routine in your cell culture lab. Its operation is so intuitive, its handling so comfortable that you can fully concentrate on your work. Choose the functions you need, and, if necessary, you can easily add a variety of accessories that are important for your work.

title: Triple Quad™ 5500+ System - QTRAP® Ready
description: The SCIEX 5500+ system is equipped to conquer your laboratory's complex workflows. With this LC-MS/MS system, you have the sensitivity and performance to meet analytical and regulatory demands for low level trace detection with ease.

title: SpectraMax® Mini Multi-Mode Microplate Reader
description: Affordable multi-mode microplate reader with best-in-class data analysis software

title: MultiWash+™ Microplate Washer
description: 96- and 384-well automated washer

title: QTRAP® 6500+ System
description: The QTRAP 6500+ offers revolutionary sensitivity, speed, and performance for your most challenging methods. This system features the multi-component IonDrive Technology, including the IonDrive Turbo V Source and newly designed IonDrive High Energy Detector, and is ideal for labs requiring the ultimate in performance. The built-in QTRAP functionality enables quantitative MRMs and qualitative QTRAP scans in the same injection to maximize throughput.

title: Synergi™ Method Development HPLC Columns
description:
Full Range of Selectivity for Reversed Phase Separation
Many different mechanisms of retention are utilized within reversed phase chromatography in order to retain and separate target analytes. Whether your compounds are hydrophobic or polar, Synergi columns provide you with a full range of selectivity, ensuring separation of the most challenging and complex mixtures.

title: DNA Extraction from Tissue
description: Agencourt DNAdvance is a high-throughput genomic DNA (gDNA) isolation reagent kit enabling the purification of high-quality DNA from mammalian tissue samples.

title: SecurityLink™ HPLC/UHPLC Fingertight Fittings
description: The SecurityLINK fingertight fitting system simplifies your system and column connections and provides consistent performance with torque limiting technology that prevents column damaging overtightening

title: Cell-Free DNA Extraction from Plasma
description: Apostle MiniMax High Efficiency Cell-Free DNA (cfDNA) extraction from plasma, serum, and urine.

title: K5C The Color CMOS Camera
description:
The powerful, focused research choice
When small details make all the difference, the K5C microscope camera gives you the power to find them. The color CMOS camera of choice for the materials and life science research expert, the K5C helps you to distinguish, study and document the small details in high resolution.

The K5C enables you to capture high-resolution images at any magnification level due to its 20 MP CMOS sensor. You’ll get insights and results for live images fast, thanks to the frame rate of 32 fps, helping you use speed to your imaging advantage.

title: Leica DM300 Educational Microscope
description: Monocular, binocular or trinocular educational microscope for life science courses.

title: Mateo TL Digital Transmitted Light Microscope
description:
Routine cell culture? Check!
For researchers who need consistent experimental outcomes, Mateo TL enables all lab members to check and document cell growth status conveniently and comfortably.

Measure confluency consistently, thereby increasing the confidence in the success of their downstream experiments.

title: Leica DM2000 Ergonomic System Microscopes for Complex Clinical Applications
description:
With their sophisticated modular design and high-performance fluorescence, the Leica DM2000 microscopes are ideal for complex tasks in pathology, cytology, and many other applications. For special diagnostics requirements, the microscope is certified for in-vitro-diagnostics (IVD) like in-vitro-fertilization (IVF).

The Leica DM2000 microscopes can be configured with a variety of optics and contrast techniques to meet the specific requirements of demanding applications.

Leica DM2000 is available in two versions, with bright halogen illumination, or with long-life LED.

title: Leica DM3000 Uniquely Ergonomic System Microscopes with Intelligent Automation
description:
Enhance Laboratory Workflow
The Leica DM3000 microscopes for pathology, cytology, haematology and many other applications feature a motorized nosepiece, condenser head, automated light intensity adjustment, and optional foot pedal. These intuitive microscopes improve workflows significantly. For special diagnostics requirements, the microscope is certified for in-vitro-diagnostics (IVD) like in-vitro-fertilization (IVF).



The motorized condenser head knows the correct position for each magnification. The Leica DM3000 automatically adjusts light intensity to each objective’s requirements, stores previously used light values for each magnification, and boosts efficiency when changing between two magnifications thanks to its unique toggle mode.

title: STELLARIS 8 STED Microscope
description:
Get faster to the truth

Our STED (stimulated emission depletion) technology joins the STELLARIS platform to provide you the fastest way of imaging beyond the diffraction limit. Obtain cutting-edge nanoscopy results in no time with astounding image quality and resolution, while protecting your sample. STED super-resolution allows you to study multiple dynamic events simultaneously, so you can investigate molecular relationships and mechanisms within the cellular context.

The seamless integration of STED and STELLARIS provides easy access to STED directly from the confocal interface, making it just a few clicks away. Now you can get more insights from your sample, because every detail matters.

title: Mica
description:
This changes everything.
More than a highly automated microscope, Mica unites widefield and confocal imaging in a sample protecting, incubating environment. With the simple push of a button, you have everything you need - all in one place - to supercharge fluorescence imaging workflows and get meaningful scientific results faster.

Now you can focus on your science, not figuring out your microscope.

Access for all
Mica provides a clear sample overview and allows to easily change observation conditions with just a few clicks

No constraints
4x more data with 100% correlation. Select the right modality in real time. Achieve physiological-like conditions thoughout your experiments

Radically simplified workflows
Intelligent automation and AI-supported analysis enables greater efficiency and a faster track to publication

title: THUNDER Imager Tissue
description:
Decode 3D biology in real time*
The THUNDER Imager Tissue allows real-time fluorescence imaging of 3D tissue sections typically used in neuroscience and histology research. Acquire rich, detailed images of thick tissues free of haze from out-of-focus blur.



Even fine structures deep in tissues can be resolved thanks to Computational Clearing, an innovative Leica technology. Image detailed morphological structures like axons and dendrites of neurons in a brain slice. The high image quality, even with thick tissue sections, is combined with the well-known speed, fluorescence efficiency, and ease of use of widefield microscopes.



Gain these advantages using a THUNDER Imager Tissue for your research:

Get computationally cleared images directly in your live preview with THUNDER Live
Rapidly acquire blur-free images showing finest details of the morphology, even deep within thick sections
Get fast overviews of whole tissue sections
Image and analyze challenging tissue sections with an easy workflow


*in accordance with ISO/IEC 2382:2015

title: ImageXpress® Pico Automated Cell Imaging System
description: Cellular imaging and analysis system that enables you to go from sample to results in minutes

title: Leica DM500 Microscopes
description: Binocular, fluorescence-capable educational microscope for life science courses

title: pCLAMP™ 11 Software Suite
description: Sophisticated patch-clamp electrophysiology data acquisition and analysis software

title: Leica M165 FC Fluorescent Stereo Microscope
description:
The Leica M165 FC fully apochromatic corrected stereo microscope with 16.5:1 zoom optics resolves structures down to 1.1 micron for detailed fluorescent imaging.



Image coding allows easy, convenient reproduction of image settings and parameters for fast, consistent, high quality observation and documentation.



TripleBeam technology dedicates a separate beam channel for fluorescence illumination to enhance image contrast, details and intensity for better performance.

title: SoftMax® Pro Software
description: The most published microplate reader control and data analysis software

title: FLIPR® Penta High-Throughput Cellular Screening System
description: High-throughput kinetic screening for toxicology and lead compound identification

title: Phenogel™ Organic GPC/SEC Columns
description:
Enhance Resolution for Polymer Analysis using Non-Aqueous GPC/SEC
Phenogel size exclusion columns for gel permeation chromatography (GPC) are composed of highly cross-linked styrene-divinylbenzene (SDVB) and achieve high resolution and tight linear calibration curves. Phenogel is available in seven different pore sizes, ranging from 50 Å to 106 Å; and a linear bed configuration. Pore size distribution and pore volume are closely controlled parameters in the manufacturing process accounting for the high resolution, tight linear calibration curves, and excellent column-to-column reproducibility. USP L21 packings available.

5 and 10 µm particle sizes
Narrow bore (4.6 mm ID) solvent-saver columns available
Highly cross-linked for mechanical and chemical stability
Temperature stable to 140 °C.

title: Strata™ Solid Phase Extraction
description: Strata SPE products are manufactured to bring you optimal quality, reproducibility, and performance. With over 20 years of experience, Strata SPE products provide clean extracts and high recoveries for a multitude of target analytes across diverse sample matrices.

title: Axia™ Preparative LC Columns
description:
Guaranteed, Longest Lasting Preparative HPLC and SFC Column
Available in over 40 unique achiral and chiral selectivities, Axia advanced preparative column packings and column hardware designs offer several advantages. Unlike traditional preparative LC column packing methods, the Axia packing method offers increased sorbent bed density for increased performance and eliminates media bed collapse as a source of premature column failure in preparative HPLC/SFC columns.

title: Intabio ZT System
description:
Comprehensive charge variant analysis made simple
The Intabio ZT system couples icIEF separation and UV detection with high resolution mass spectrometry on the ZenoTOF 7600 system.

title: THUNDER Imager Model Organism
description:
The THUNDER Imager Model Organism allows fast and easy 3D exploration of whole organisms for developmental or molecular biology research. Thanks to THUNDER Live, your images reveal the finest structural details already in the live image. No hassle with out-of-focus blur while maintaining the capabilities and ease-of-use typical for Leica stereo microscopes.



A THUNDER Imager Model Organism is the optimal instrument for studying, e.g., Drosophila, C. elegans, zebrafish, plants, and mice. One device for screening, positioning, and imaging your specimen. Simplify your workflow and study model organisms from a large overview to the highest detail.

title: X500R QTOF System
description: This QTOF mass spectrometer is uniquely engineered and versatile to handle the demands of any high throughput laboratory. Incorporating the robustness of Turbo V ionization source along with MRMHR, the X500R QTOF System can quantify food and environmental testing samples to regulatory compliance requirements. For complete unknown screening, SWATH acquisition detects any trace level compounds and delivers vital MS/MS data for forensic crime lab workflows.

title: Leica M205 C Encoded Stereo Microscopes
description:
Total recall of your settings
Your goal: high-quality images that allow measurements and can be accurately repeated with minimal effort. The Leica coded stereo microscopes help you to pave the way to correct results.

Coded microscopes consistently deliver calibrated and comparable images
Reproduce images in moments with the Leica “Store and Recall” function
Fully apochromatic corrected zoom optics deliver high quality images
Customize the microscope system to your task with the exclusive range of accessories

title: DNA Extraction from Blood
description: GenFind V3 isolates and purifies genomic DNA (gDNA) from whole blood

title: STELLARIS 8 CRS Coherent Raman Scattering Microscope
description:
Explore label-free chemical microscopy
When you need to study structures that cannot be visualized with traditional fluorescent microscopy methods, the STELLARIS 8 Coherent Raman Scattering (CRS) microscope enables you to implement label-free chemical imaging into your workflow to answer those challenging research questions.



With STELLARIS 8 CRS, you can image a wide range of specimens at high speed and resolution using different modalities: Stimulated Raman Scattering (SRS), Coherent Anti-Stokes Raman Scattering (CARS), Second Harmonic Generation (SHG), two-photon fluorescence, and visible confocal fluorescence.



Take advantage of these modalities to maximize the information you get from your sample.

title: DNA Plasmid Purification
description: CosMCPrep is a Solid Phase Reversible Immobilization (SPRI) paramagnetic bead-based purification system that uses a single protocol to purify a variety of high- and low-copy number template types.

title: THUNDER Imager EM Cryo CLEM
description:
The THUNDER Imager EM Cryo CLEM is a cryo light microscope featuring opto-digital THUNDER technology. It provides the imaging data and secure cryo conditions you need for successful experimental investigations concerning structural biology. Precisely identify cellular structures of interest thanks to high resolution, haze-free imaging with THUNDER technology, then transfer the specimen seamlessly to your EM.

For research use only

title: LAS X Life Science Microscope Software Platform
description:
One for all
Do you struggle with a variety of instruments, protocols, and software interfaces in your lab?

Leica Application Suite X (LAS X) is the one software platform for all Leica microscopes: It integrates confocal, widefield, stereo, super-resolution, and light-sheet instruments from Leica Microsystems.

Users spend more time researching
Imaging tasks become intuitive

From basic documentation to advanced life science research – LAS X directly navigates you to brilliant imaging!

title: DMi8 S Inverted Microscope Solution
description: The modular DMi8 inverted microscope is the heart of the DMi8 S platform solution. For routine to live cell research, the DMi8 S platform is a complete solution. Whether you need to precisely follow the development of a single cell in a dish, screen through multiple assays, obtain single molecule resolution, or tease out behaviors of complex processes, a DMi8 S system will enable you to see more, see faster, and find the hidden.

title: Leica EZ4 E
description: Educational stereo microscopes for college and university.

title: M205 FCA Fluorescence Stereo Microscopes
description:
Capture bright images – fast!
Do you sometimes feel like you are fishing in the dark because you are looking for fluorescence signals that are increasingly faint and weak? Brightness and high resolution images are a must in modern developmental biology and research. Leica Microsystems has developed the M205 FCA  fluorescence stereo microscopes to enable you to detect transgenic expression like GFP and mCherry in early stages, allowing you to select the right sample to successfully base your studies on.

title: Leica M80 Ergonomic Stereo Microscopes for Inspection with Removable Integrated Camera
description: The Leica M80 stereo microscope is a versatile solution, excelling in inspection tasks with its ergonomic design and removable integrated camera. Tailored for professionals, this microscope offers unparalleled clarity and ease of use, enhancing the efficiency of inspection processes. Its ergonomic features ensure comfortable use during prolonged periods of work. The removable integrated camera adds a layer of flexibility, allowing users to document and analyze their inspections seamlessly. Elevate your inspection experience with the Leica M80, a reliable stereo microscope that combines precision, ergonomics, and advanced imaging capabilities for optimal performance.

title: Leica DM500 Educational Microscope
description: The Leica DM500 microscope is an excellent educational tool, combining precision optics with user-friendly design. Tailored for educational settings, this microscope offers clear and detailed imaging for students to explore the world of microscopy with ease. Its intuitive features make it perfect for classroom use, allowing students to engage in hands-on learning experiences. The Leica DM500 is an ideal choice for educational institutions seeking a reliable and versatile microscope to enhance the learning journey and foster a deeper understanding of the microscopic world.

title: Leica Emspira 3 Digital Microscopes for Inspection
description: The Leica Emspira 3 digital microscope is a cutting-edge tool tailored for precision inspection tasks. With advanced digital capabilities and high-quality imaging, this microscope transforms the inspection process, providing detailed and clear visualizations. Its user-friendly design and versatility make it an ideal choice for professionals seeking efficiency and accuracy in inspection applications. Elevate your inspection workflow with the Leica Emspira 3, a digital microscope designed to meet the demands of meticulous inspection tasks with exceptional clarity and ease.

title: Leica Ivesta 3 Stereo Microscopes for Inspection with Integrated Camera
description: The Leica Ivesta 3 stereo microscope is a powerhouse for inspection and rework, featuring an integrated camera for documentation. Designed for professionals, this microscope combines superior optics with advanced imaging capabilities, providing unparalleled clarity in inspection and rework tasks. The integrated camera adds an extra layer of efficiency, allowing users to document and analyze their work seamlessly. Elevate your work processes with the Leica Ivesta 3, a reliable stereo microscope that seamlessly integrates cutting-edge technology to enhance accuracy and productivity in inspection and rework applications.

title: Leica Mateo TL for Easy Confluency Checks
description: The Leica Mateo TL for Easy Confluency Checks is an innovative digital microscope tailored for routine checks and documentation of cell cultures. Featuring an integrated camera, advanced optics, and proven algorithms this microscope  ensures quick and accurate automatic confluency evaluations. Streamline your workflow with the Leica Mateo TL, making confluency determination a seamless and efficient task in your cell culture lab.

title: Leica EZ4 Stereo Microscope for Education
description: The Leica EZ4 stereo microscope is a versatile and user-friendly instrument designed with education in mind. Featuring exceptional optics and ergonomic design, this microscope provides an immersive learning experience for students. Its ease of use and robust construction make it an ideal tool for educational settings, allowing students to explore the microscopic world with clarity and precision. The Leica EZ4 is the perfect companion for fostering curiosity and hands-on learning in the classroom.

title: Fura-2 QBT™ Calcium Kit
description: For researchers concerned about assay artifacts, the Fura-2 QBT Calcium Kit is a simple, mix-and-read format that employs our proprietary masking technology with the industry-standard Fura-2 ratiometric calcium indicator to accurately measure calcium mobilization.

title: E-WorkBook ELN
description: E-WorkBook ELN is our core informatics platform for research and innovation. It’s flexible. It’s configurable. It’s secure.

title: K3M The Microscope Cameras
description:
For Life Science and Industry Imaging Applications and Analysis
The K3M monochrome cameras are your solutions for fast and reliable analytical tasks typically done for life science, industrial, and clinical applications. These cameras empower you to image a vast range of challenging samples with color-brightfield and fluorescence microscopy. Examples include fluorescently labeled and stained tissues and cells, particles for cleanliness analysis, steel, and forensic evidence.

Navigating your biopharma lifecycle
Meet IDBS Polar, the world’s first BioPharma Lifecycle Management (BPLM) platform, eliminating repetitive manual tasks, allowing you to efficiently execute your processes while curating the data you need to accelerate time to market by tackling the biggest challenges in process design, optimization, scale-up and technology transfer.

title: GenomeLab GeXP™ System
description: The GenomeLab GeXP system is a DNA sequencing and qPCR system for quantitative gene expression, DNA sequencing, genotyping and/or fragment analysis.

title: Luna® High Performance LC Columns
description:
One of the World’s Leading LC Columns
The Luna brand of columns and media is more than just a product line from Phenomenex. It is a pledge to provide you with the highest level of satisfaction for your chromatographic goals. Explore resolution with the 10 unique Luna selectivities and find your next selectivity tool. Combined with high surface area (400 m2/g) particles, the Luna family of columns offers an excellent HPLC performance for a wide range of chromatographic applications.

Extensive line of rugged USP and Ph. Eur. phases
Wide range of selectivities available
Easy method scalability from HPLC to preparative and bulk purification LC

title: Rezex™ HPLC Columns
description:
Excellent Resolution and Reproducibility for Carbohydrates and Organic Acids
Rezex HPLC columns achieve reproducible, accurate separations based on multiple modes of interaction. Available in 4 and 8 cross linked sulfonated styrene divinylbenzene (and multiple ionic forms (sodium, hydrogen, potassium, lead, and silver) for a wide range of selectivities. USP L17, L19, L22, L34, and L58 packings available.



Use Rezex for carbohydrate, oligosaccharide, and organic acid separations:

Drug formulation and excipient analysis
Food and beverage quality control testing
Fermentation reaction monitoring and recover testing for biofuels

title: SecurityGuard™ Column Protection
description:
Universal Column Protection
Protects and extends UHPLC, HPLC and PREP column lifetime
Virtually no change in chromatography
Simple to use

title: PA 800 Plus Pharmaceutical Analysis System
description: Flexible platform for multiple analytical assays with a temperature controlled capillary for the utmost data reproducibility and confidence.

title: Onyx Monolithic HPLC Columns
description:
Finish First with Monolithic Silica HPLC Columns
Onyx is a silica monolithic HPLC column designed for high speed analysis. The monolithic nature allots for "dilute-and-shoot" applications saving scientists valuable sample preparation time.

title: Phenex™ Syringe Filters
description:
LC/GC Approved Syringe Filters
Phenex syringe filters are designed for efficient and rapid filtration of almost any solution prior to analysis, and are optimized for superior flow rates and high-throughput. Proper membrane and size selection are the keys to choosing the best product to maintain the integrity of your sample components as well as to protect your system from particulate contamination. Phenex offers a wide variety of membranes ideal for any application.



Try our Phenex Syringe Filters for:

High quality filtration product
Increased column lifetime
Less system downtime
Low protein absorption

title: Novum™ Simplified Liquid Extraction
description: Simplify Your Liquid-Liquid Extractions with Faster, Easier, and More Reliable SLE

title: DispenCell™ Single-Cell Dispenser
description: Compact, automated cell dispenser for fast, easy and gentle single-cell isolation

title: SpectraMax® M Series Multi-Mode Microplate Readers
description: Configurable readers with triple-mode cuvette ports, validation tools, and compliance software

title: THUNDER Imager Live Cell & 3D Assay
description:
With THUNDER Imagers you begin every experiment with confidence. They are your solution for advanced 3D cell culture assays, whether you want to study stem cells, spheroids, or organoids.

THUNDER Imagers feature the innovative Leica technology Computational Clearing. It efficiently removes out-of-focus blur in real time, enabling the meaningful use of 3D specimens with camera-based fluorescence microscopes. The high sensitivity of the system ensures low phototoxicity and photobleaching, i.e., higher throughput with optimal conditions.

title: K3C The Microscope Cameras
description:
For Life Science and Industry Imaging Applications and Analysis
The K3C color cameras are your solutions for fast and reliable analytical tasks typically done for life science, industrial, and clinical applications. These cameras empower you to image a vast range of challenging samples with color-brightfield and fluorescence microscopy. Examples include fluorescently labeled and stained tissues and cells, particles for cleanliness analysis, steel, and forensic evidence.

description: Ergonomic systems for routine and research applications

description:
Total recall of your settings
Your goal: high-quality images that allow measurements and can be accurately repeated with minimal effort. The Leica coded stereo microscopes help you to pave the way to correct results.

Coded microscopes consistently deliver calibrated and comparable images
Reproduce images in moments with the Leica “Store and Recall” function
Fully apochromatic corrected zoom optics deliver high quality images
Customize the microscope system to your task with the exclusive range of accessories

title: Luna® Omega HPLC/UHPLC LC Columns
description:
World Renowned HPLC Media Reinvented for UHPLC!
The cutting edge thermally modified Luna Omega particle delivers high efficiency, ruggedness, reproducibility, and dependability for a wide range of chromatographic analyses. Luna Omega HPLC and UHPLC columns are built upon more then 20 years of applied knowledge, invention, and customer experience in the manufacture and packing of LC columns. The particle’s novel design and proprietary manufacturing process results in greater particle inertness, a stronger particle morphology, and more consistent porosity.

Greater separation muscle and retention
Consistent porous structure and elimination of micropores
Extreme ruggedness and reproducibility

description:

title: Biozen™ Biologics LC Columns
description:
Explore Biozen LC Portfolio
With a new titanium BioTi biocompatible hardware to minimize priming, four particle platforms for optimal versatility and nine particle chemistries to maximize selectivity and sensitivity, Biozen UHPLC/HPLC columns are seamlessly designed to bring peace of mind to your analysis of biologics through:

Charge Variant Analysis
Aggregate Analysis
Peptide Mapping
Intact Mass Intact and Fragment Analysis
Glycan Analysis
Peptide Quantitation
Drug Antibody Ratio (DAR)
Oligonucleotide Characterization

title: Gemini™ pH Flexible LC
description:
Twin-NX technology HPLC columns. Extend your column lifetime
Gemini columns are rugged reversed phase HPLC and PREP LC columns that offer extended lifetime at pH 1-12 conditions and excellent stability for reproducible, high efficiency separations. The Gemini family contains a variety of useful akyl and phenyl phases bonded to fully porous organo-silica particles.

title: Jupiter® HPLC Columns
description:
RP-HPLC for Protein/Peptide Analysis and Purification

The Jupiter HPLC fully porous column portfolio, including Jupiter 300Å C4/C5/C18 (Intact) and Jupiter Proteo C12 (Peptide Mapping), offers optimized reversed phase solutions for protein and peptide characterization and purification. With these columns, one can identify, purify, and analyze almost any protein.

description:

Dynamic DeckOptix System reduces errors by identifying misplaced labware
Reduced hands-on time for NGS protocols

title: Phree™ Phospholipid Removal Products
description: Phree Phospholipid Removal Solutions offer a fast effective way to remove proteins and phospholipids from plasma samples without negatively affecting the recovery of your target analytes.

title: Clarity® BioSolutions
description:
Each product in the Clarity BioSolutions portfolio has been designed to efficiently and effectively purify or characterize synthetic oligonucleotides used in biological research, therapeutic development and biochemical manufacturing.

Easily separate N-1 failure sequences from target oligo with > 90% purities
Trityl-off purification of DNA, RNA, Thioates, and modified/labeled oligonucleotides
Preparative dimensions and particle sizes for loads > 5μmol
Purify oligos up to 60 mer in length
Excellent column for reversed phase HPLC quality control (QC) testing

title: Aeris™ Core-Shell Columns
description:
Phenomenex Aeris Core-Shell Technology for Proteins and Peptides
Aeris Core-Shell columns are precision engineered for protein and peptide separation resulting in higher efficiency
